title: Medical Intuitive Caroline Myss
description: From a September 17, 1998 Oprah Winfrey Show: Caroline Myss describes how she is able to read a person's energy and diagnose medical conditions even before doctors do. She performs several readings on audience members and debunks commonly held myths about healing.
author: podcasts@own.oprah.com (Oprah)
content:encoded: From a September 17, 1998 Oprah Winfrey Show: Caroline Myss describes how she is able to read a person's energy and diagnose medical conditions even before doctors do. She performs several readings on audience members and debunks commonly held myths about healing.
